item.title: [EU][Web Cloud] - Outlook Web Access mailbox migration
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Dec 9, 2025, 18:00 UTC  -  May 10, 2026, 20:00 UTC

Nov 21, 09:59 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Web Cloud offer.

Start time : 09/12/2025 18:00 UTC
End time : 31/05/2026 09:44 UTC
Service impact : Service interruption is expected for a few minutes to a few hours
Affected customers will receive several emails notifying them of the maintenance day.
During this period, emails received will be delivered after the short interruption.

Service improvement : The purpose of this operation is to migrate MXPLAN mailboxes under Outlook Web Access (OWA) to the new Zimbra Webmail.
No action is required from the customers.
For further information, please find attached a link to the FAQ: https://help.ovhcloud.com/csm/fr-mx-plan-zimbra-faq?id=kb_article_view&sysparm_article=KB0061410

Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [GLOBAL][Domains] - Domains Name incident notification on .MS
item.description:
Dec 2, 16:19 UTC
Identified - We have determined the origin of the incident affecting our .MS Domains offer, customers in the impacted zone are unable to perform some tasks on .MS domains.

Here are some supplementary details :

Start time : 02/12/2025 16:00 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : Multiple operations (Registration, Renew, Transfer, Restore, Delete) are temporarily unavailable for .MS domains.
Customers Impact : Customers are temporarily unable to perform specified operations on .MS domains.
Root Cause : This incident is caused by a maintenance of one of our providers.
Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilised to restore service as quickly as possible.

Start time : 26/11/2025 20:00 UTC
End time : 26/11/2025 21:00 UTC
Service impact : During the maintenance, customers cannot access their email accounts via webmail or mail clients. They cannot send or receive messages for 5 minutes. Incoming emails will be queued and delivered after the maintenance.

Thank you for your understanding.

Customers Impact : Customers were temporarily unable to access webmail via the web interface or desktop client. Emails sent or received were temporarily unavailable and have been delivered once the incident was resolved.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Nov 26, 14:59 UTC
Update - Please find below an update on the situation:
Update : The incident has been resolved by our teams, and no emails have been lost. Incoming/outgoing emails in the queue are currently being processed. However, due to the large number of emails, processing may take some time.
Ongoing Actions : Our teams are currently processing the backlog.

We will get back to you when the situation is resolved.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

item.title: [GLOBAL][Web Hosting] - OVH Mail Migrator maintenance notification
item.description:
Nov 26, 01:42 UTC
Completed - We would like to inform you that the maintenance on our Web Hosting offer is now completed.
All services are operational.

Thank you for your patience throughout this maintenance.

Nov 24, 07:30 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Nov 18, 23:51 UTC
Scheduled - As part of a complete overhaul of our interface and a user experience enhancement, a new website and a new API called v3 will be available.

Start time : 24/11/2025 07:30 UTC
End time : 26/11/2025 18:30 UTC
Service impact : OVH Mail Migrator API and UI.
Service improvement : During the update, the current website will be in maintenance mode. When the new website and API are released, the previous website will be in read only for 2 months to let you access your previous migrations.

You will be invited to go to the new website at https://omm.ovhcloud.com to create new migrations.

The new API v3 replaces the old one, and you'll need to use it to create new migrations, projects, or file uploads. It will be available at https://api.omm.ovhcloud.com/swagger.

Thank you for your understanding

Investigating - We are currently investigating an incident affecting our Web Hosting offering, which is causing temporary availability issue in the cluster 100.

Here are some supplementary details :

Start time : 20/11/2025 10:54 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : File server 2178 is unreachable on Web Hosting cluster 100.
Ongoing Actions : Our teams are investigating to determine the origin of the incident and fix it.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

item.title: [GLOBAL][Web Hosting] - Restore Snapshot incident notification
item.description:
Nov 19, 09:39 UTC

Update - We are continuing to investigate this issue.

Nov 18, 14:14 UTC
Investigating - We are currently investigating an incident affecting our restore snapshot function on web hosting offer.

Here are some supplementary details :

Start time : 14/11/2025 7:48 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : Some restore snapshots are temporarily unavailable.
Customers Impact : Customers may receive an error message when requesting a restore snapshot.
Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilised to restore service as quickly as possible.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.
